title.rendered: The Evolution of Creative Website Marketing — From 1999 to 2019

content.rendered:
Creative Website Marketing is more excited than ever to be officially relaunched and back in business to help companies elevate their digital marketing strategy!

As this may be our first blog post, let us assure you — we have a substantial history within digital marketing and we would love to share more about it below.

20+ Years of Digital Marketing Experience

Our CEO, Debbie Hill, started Creative Website Marketing in 1999. She successfully managed the company and quickly became a trusted partner in the digital marketing space, working with brands such as GE, Atria Senior Living, Learning House and many more. In 2014 Debbie chose to move from Louisville, KY to Nashville, TN, accepting a job with Brookdale Senior Living (while putting CWM on pause). As Brookdale’s Director of Digital Marketing, she led paid search initiatives to drive a steady flow of leads into the sales pipeline for nurturing and closing.

Fast forward to 2017 and Debbie has reclaimed her passion for entrepreneurship and is fully focused on the success of CWM. With our refocused efforts, we have expanded our team and are currently working with businesses nation-wide to provide relevant digital marketing strategies. We feel very confident in confirming our commitment to being an impact leader within digital marketing and providing affordable and quality service to our clients.

Service Offerings

Speaking of service, let’s highlight some of our service offerings your business might need.

  • Google Adwords Paid Search Campaigns
  • Marketing Strategy for Single and Multi-Location Businesses
  • Digital Brand Foundation
  • Content Marketing & SEO
  • Landing Page Optimization
  • Display Ad Retargeting

Our specialty is providing proven strategy and direction for clients to maximize their Digital presence while avoiding costly mistakes. The Digital world is in a constant state of change, so we bring up to date strategies that make sense to help our clients reach their overall business goals.

Each client has unique businesses and goals, so we are nimble and take a custom approach to our strategy and campaign management. We listen first, make sure we understand your goals and then we craft the best approach that will deliver the results you envision.

Let’s Connect!

We’re headquartered in Nashville, TN and are always excited to meet folks interested in networking, talking shop and staying current with industry trends.

If you’re a…

  • Small business with little marketing experience
  • Big business that needs a digital expert
  • Marketing firm that needs a digital outsource

…We should talk and collaborate.

Contact us here today!

Creative Website Marketing is a digital marketing agency in Nashville, TN, helping businesses throughout the country execute strategic brand awareness + lead generation efforts.

@graph.name: Debbie Hill
@graph.description: Debbie Hill is the CEO at Creative Website Marketing, a Nashville, TN based digital marketing firm that partners with businesses to increase brand awareness and lead generation through paid media including PPC, SEO, content marketing and relevant social media strategies. To collaborate with Creative Website Marketing or discuss your digital marketing needs, please visit our website at www.CreativeWebsiteMarketing.com and request a Free Digital Audit.
